entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
